message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly exceptional and holds great value. I believe it's worth more than its face value, but let's make this transaction work for both of us. I am offering it to you for $150. This includes not only the product itself but also a complimentary service package that will enhance your experience with it. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations or if you'd like to discuss other options.
